channel.title: Error_game_js5connect on 508 Client
channel.description:
OK, I know several topics have been posted about this. But none of them helped me. I was following Tony's guide on how to set up a 508 HD server and I got up to the step where you run the server, when I tried running the server then client and I type in my IP (this usually happens when I type my IP), the client was stuck on 'Connecting to update server'. I checked my No-IP and there was this face with red cheeks lol. I also tried portforwarding and I have a wireless router if that changes anything. If you can help me it would be appreciated =D.
Thanks

item.title: Error_game_js5connect on 508 Client
item.dc:creator: @Jake0r Jake0r
item.description:
@Jake0r wrote:

Even if it didn’t work, I get the same error on most 508 servers >.>.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 08, 2009, 05:33:40 am[/size][hr]Ok, I tried using it on my computer [which I barely use] and it worked, and my comp is Windows Vista. Does Windows 7 change anything?

Read full topic

Thanks[/quote]

Don’t post multiple topics about this…
Tony’s tutorial doesn’t work.
It USED to.
